title: Death by Mocking
content:
Don't tease or mock anyone in a horror film. The monster doesn't like it, and will kill you for it. Not that the monster actually likes the people you mock (it will kill them too). It's just that mocking is the monster's thing. You're butting in.

So don't tease people, don't treat anyone like they're crazy for talking about the monster, and don't play any practical jokes. The last one isn't a Deadly Prank, where someone will get hurt. The monster will just kill you later for pulling one.

Note that this doesn't count if the people you tease laugh with you. That isn't mocking; it's just having fun.

Compare Do Not Taunt Cthulhu, Death by Sex, Death by Materialism, Death by Genre Savviness, Did You Just Flip Off Cthulhu?, Offing the Mouth, Let's Mock the Monsters (when the characters decide to go one step further).

As a Death Trope, all Spoilers will be unmarked ahead. Beware.
